Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Tarik Skubal in the fifth inning.
Hunter Gaddis struck out Kerry Carpenter with bases loaded in the sixth inning.
Eli Morgan struck out both batters he faced in the seventh inning.
Emmanuel Clase got the final six outs to secure the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Before the game, manager Stephen Vogt was confident his team wasn’t done, saying 'It feels like we’re going to New York.'
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians are on their way to the ALCS for the first time since 2016.
The Tigers had their late-season push end in disappointment after going 31-13 post-August 11 to earn a postseason berth.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians won the tough AL Central under first-year manager Stephen Vogt.
The Tigers swept the Houston Astros in the wild-card round before meeting Cleveland in the postseason for the first time after more than 2,300 games between the franchises.
